travelAgencyModel

Class BusAndChaffeurTravel

  • java.lang.Object
    • travelAgencyModel.Travel
      • travelAgencyModel.BusAndChaffeurTravel
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class BusAndChaffeurTravel
extends Travel
    Extension of Travel that forces a single Chauffeur and a personCount to be included. Implements Serialization by extension.
    Author:
    DVN
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • BusAndChaffeurTravel

        public BusAndChaffeurTravel(Customer customer,
                            Bus bus,
                            Chauffeur chauffeur,
                            int personCount,
                            java.time.LocalDateTime reservationStartDate,
                            java.time.LocalDateTime reservationEndDate)
        Six parameter constructor.
        Parameters:
        customer - The Customer making the reservation.
        bus - The Bus assigned the reservation.
        chauffeur - The Chauffeur assigned the reservation.
        personCount - The expected or maximum amount of passengers this reservation covers.
        reservationStartDate - The start date of the reservation.
        reservationEndDate - The end date of the reservation.
